properties.areaDesc: Clinton, PA; Clearfield, PA; Centre, PA
properties.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued January 8 at 7:12AM EST until January 8 at 8:00AM EST by NWS State College PA
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a

* Snow Squall Warning for...
Central Clearfield County in central Pennsylvania...
Northwestern Centre County in central Pennsylvania...
West central Clinton County in north central Pennsylvania...

* Until 800 AM EST.

* At 712 AM EST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line
extending from near Monument to Pine Glen to 6 miles southeast of
Brookville, moving east at 45 mph.

HAZARD...Extremely poor visibility in snow and blowing snow. Wind
gusts up to 30 mph.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Expect hazardous road conditions.

* For those driving on Interstate 80, this includes areas between the
Dubois and Milesburg exits, specifically from mile markers 97 to
154.

Locations impacted include...
DuBois, Clearfield, Sandy, Woodland, Curwensville, Hyde,
Plymptonville, Rockton, Karthaus, Snow Shoe, Clarence, Moshannon,
Pine Glen, Monument, Lecontes Mills, S.B. Elliot State Park,
Morrisdale, Grassflat, Grampian and Kylertown.
properties.instruction:
Reduce your speed and turn on headlights! During snow squalls, the
visibility may suddenly drop to near zero in whiteout conditions.

CMAMtext: Snow Squall Warning til 8:00 AM EST. Sudden whiteouts. Icy roads. Slow down! -NWS
